com.mnnit.tutorspoint

Class LoginLayoutController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mnnit.tutorspoint.LoginLayoutController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public final class LoginLayoutController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The controller of the LoginLayout.

    The login layout consists of a basic login UI with two text fields and a login button

      • onResizableStage

        public static void onResizableStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage,
                                    java.util.function.Consumer<javafx.stage.Stage> consumer)
        This method is used when we want a stage that is not resizable to work as if it were. If the parameterized stage is not resizable then it is made resizable but after the execution of the consumer, the stage is not set to be resizeable.
        Parameters:
        stage -
        consumer -
